Dear diary: today I found a new past-time; listening to people that think societal changes, technological changes and such can be stopped like just pressing a brake on a car.

"I just don't like how kids today use their phones so much"
"Well how do you propose stopping people from using their cellphones without crashing the economy?"
". . . shit"
